title: If I give improvement in CBSE 2019 , will CBSE send me passing certificate of 209? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: No!!! in certificate it will be mentioned that your date of improvement exam is 2019 and year of passing will be 2018 !! It will not create any problems in future but the only thing is you have to produce both the certificate everywhere Note: In your job resume also…. The certificate looks as below:  Hope it helps!!!
